DIR_STATE:["src/borderline_qa/__init__.py", "src/borderline_qa/citations.py", "src/borderline_qa/harness_adapter.py", "src/borderline_qa/pipeline.py", "src/borderline_qa/retriever.py", "src/borderline_qa/verifier.py"]
SUMMARY: Implemented a harness adapter that normalizes pipeline outputs, enforces must-cite constraints, logs decisions to JSONL, and provides a FAR/coverage summary helper.
